page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT -CAMELS' AREA
page.content: Although the area is mainly one of agriculture, few people who live here work on the land. In fact, of 100 people questioned only 6 work on farms. Most people travel by car into Yeovil with 18 being employed by the Westlands Helicopter Co. or their subsidiaries. 12 travel to Yeovilton to be employed at H.M.S. Heron. Haynes Publishing Co., based in Sparkford, employs 14 people from the area. 19 people are employed locally in jobs like garage mechanic, waitressing and building. 9 people travel to Sherborne and 8 people to Wincanton for employment, mainly in business. 3 people travel to Templecombe and are employed by an electronics firm. 10 people travel widely in their jobs 8 as sales representatives and 2 as lorry drivers.There is little unemployment in our area.
